title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: COMIC: Exploring the ocean's wonderous, mysterious depths
items.description: Did you know that we know less about the sea than we do about space? With this comic, we explore some of what scientists do know about Earth's ocean.

items.title: Assad is gone. But can Syrians go home?
items.description: After over a decade in exile, many Syrians living abroad are contemplating what was once unthinkable: going home. But what does home look like today?
